tools.name: run_glif
tools.description: Execute AI workflows on Glif.app by running a specific glif with its ID and input values, enabling tasks like image generation, meme creation, and chained LLM calls.
tools.instructions: Run a glif with the specified ID and inputs
tools.jsonSchema: { "properties": { "id": { "description": "The ID of the glif to run", "type": "string" }, "inputs": { "description": "Array of input values for the glif", "items": { "type": "string" }, "type": "array" } }, "required": [ "id", "inputs" ], "type": "object" }

tools.name: list_featured_glifs
tools.description: Retrieve a curated list of featured glifs to access pre-built workflows for AI tasks like image generation and chained LLM calls.
tools.instructions: Get a curated list of featured glifs

tools.name: glif_info
tools.description: Retrieve comprehensive details about a specific glif, including input fields, using the ID provided. Ideal for managing and optimizing AI workflows hosted on Glif.
tools.instructions: Get detailed information about a glif including input fields
tools.jsonSchema: { "properties": { "id": { "description": "The ID of the glif to show details for", "type": "string" } }, "required": [ "id" ], "type": "object" }

tools.name: my_glifs
tools.description: Retrieve and manage a list of your AI workflows hosted on Glif's MCP server, including image generators, meme tools, and chained LLM calls, for streamlined access and organization.
tools.instructions: Get a list of your glifs

tools.name: my_glif_user_info
tools.description: Retrieve detailed user account data, recent glifs, and workflow runs to manage activities on the Glif MCP server efficiently.
tools.instructions: Get detailed information about your user account, recent glifs, and recent runs
